biomes.conditions: biome.isForest && !(biome.isHot || biome.isSwamp || biome.isDead || biome.isSnowy || biome.isCold || biome.isOcean || biome.isWasteland || biome.isJungle || biome.isDense)
biome.isForest && biome.isDense && !(biome.isHot || biome.isSwamp || biome.isDead || biome.isSnowy || biome.isCold || biome.isOcean || biome.isWasteland || biome.isJungle)

biomes._comment: Special Swamps such as Fen, Bog, Marsh, etc.

biomes.conditions: biome.isSwamp && !(biome.isDead || biome.isHills || biome.isMountain || biome.isCold || biome.isSnowy || biome.isForest)
!(biome.isOcean || biome.isRiver || biome.isNether || biome.isEnd || biome.isMushroom) && !(biome.isFake || biome.isSnowy || biome.isSandy || biome.isBeach || biome.isMountain)

!(biome.isOcean || biome.isRiver || biome.isNether || biome.isEnd || biome.isMushroom) && !(biome.isFake || biome.isSnowy || biome.isSwamp || biome.isJungle || biome.isBeach || biome.isWasteland || biome.isWet)
!(biome.isOcean || biome.isRiver || biome.isNether || biome.isEnd) && !(biome.isFake || biome.isSnowy || biome.isJungle || biome.isHot || biome.isBeach)
!(biome.isOcean || biome.isRiver || biome.isNether || biome.isEnd) && !(biome.isFake || biome.isDry || biome.isJungle || biome.isHot || biome.isBeach || biome.isSwamp || biome.isWasteland)
biome.isForest && !(biome.isHot || biome.isSwamp || biome.isDead || biome.isCold || biome.isOcean || biome.isWasteland || biome.isJungle)
!(biome.isMushroom || biome.isDead || biome.isSwamp || biome.isJungle || biome.isWasteland || biome.isOcean || biome.isSnowy || biome.isNether || biome.isEnd || biome.isFake)
